5.text: The sons of Japheth: Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech and Tiras.

6.text: And the sons of Gomer: Ashchenaz and Riphath, and Togarmah.

7.text: The sons of Javan: Elishah, and Tarshish, Chittim and Dodanim.

8.text: The sons of Ham: Cush, and Mizraim, Put, and Canaan.

9.text: The sons of Cush: Seba, and Havilah, and Sabta, and Raamah, and Sabtecha. And the sons of Raamah: Sheba and Dedan.

10.text: And Cush begat Nimrod. He began to be strong in the earth.

11.text: And Mizraim begat Ludim and Anamim, and Lehabim, and Naphtuhim,

12.text: And Pathrusim, and Casluhim, (which came forth from them the Philisteim) and Caphtorim.

13.text: And Canaan begat Zidon, his firstborn, and Heth,

14.text: And the Jesubite, and the Amorite, and Girgashite,

15.text: And the Hivite, and the Archite, and the Sinite,

16.text: And the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite,

17.text: The sons of Shem: Elam, and Ashur, and Arphaxad, and Lud, and Aram, and Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Meshech,

18.text: And Arphaxad begat Shelah and Shelah begat Eber.

19.text: And to Eber being born two sons: the name of the one Peleg, for in his days was the earth divided: and the name of the brother Joktan.

20.text: And Joktan began Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah.

22.text: And Ebal, and Abimael, and Sheba,

23.text: And Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobah All these sons of Joktan.

28.text: The sons of Abraham: Isaak, and Ishmael.

29.text: These their generations: Ishmael, Nebaioth; and Kedar, and Adbeel, and Mibsam,

30.text: Mishmah, and Dumah, Massa, Hadad, and Tema,

31.text: Jetur, Naphish, and Kedemah. These the sons of Ishmael.

32.text: And the sons of Keturah, Abrahamâ€™s concubine: she brought forth Zimran, and Jokshan, and Medan, and Midian, and Ishbak and Shuah. And the sons of Jokshan; Sheba, and Dedan.

33.text: And the sons of Midian: Ephah, and Epher and Henoch, and Abidah, and Eldaah: All these the sons of Keturah.

34.text: And Abraham will beget Isaak. The sons of Isaak: Esau and Israel.

35.text: The sons of Esau: Eliphaz, Reuel, and Jeush, and Jaalam, and Korah.

36.text: The sons of Eliphaz: Teman, and Omar, Zephi, and Gatam, Kenaz, and Timna, and Amalek.

37.text: The sons of Reuel: Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, Mizzah,

38.text: And the sons of Seir: Lotan, and Shobal, and Zibeon, and Anah, and Dishon, and Ezer, and Dishan.

39.text: And the sons of Lotan: Hori, and Homam: and the sister of Lotan, Timna.

40.text: And the sons of Shobal: Alian and Manahath, and Ebal, Shephi, and Onam. And the sons of Zibeon: Aiah and Anah.

41.text: The sons of Anah: Dishon and the sons of Dishon: Hamram and Eshban, and Ithran and Charm.

42.text: The sons of Ezer: Bilhan, and Zavan and Jakan. The sons of Dishan: Uz and Aran.

43.text: And these the kings which reigned in the land of Edom before a king reigned for the sons of Israel: Bela the son of Beor: and the name of his city Dinhabah.

44.text: And Bela will die, and Jobab son of Zerah of Borah will reign in his stead.

45.text: And Jobab will die, and Husham from the land of the Temanites will reign in his stead.

46.text: And Husham will die, and Hadad son of Bedad will reign in his stead: he struck Midian in the field of Moab: and the name of his city, Avith.

47.text: And Hadad will die, and Samlah of Mazrekah will reign in his stead.

48.text: And Samlah will die, and Saul from Rehoboth of the river will reign in his stead.

49.text: And Saul will die, and Baal Hanan son of Achbor will reign in his stead.

50.text: And Baal-Hanan will die, and Hadad will reign in his stead: and the name of his city Pai; and the name of his wife was Mehetabel, daughter of Matred, daughter of Mezahab.

51.text: And Hadad will die. And the chiefs of Edom will be chief Timna, chief Aliah, chief Jetheth.

52.text: Chief Aholibamah, chief Elah, chief Pinon,

53.text: Chief Kenaz, chief Teman, chief Mibzar,

54.text: Chief Magdiel, chief Iram. These the chiefs of Edom.
